This is a web extension for developers, Now you can record your voice and add fully descriptive comments in form of audio files to your codebase.

version 1.3.1.0
* Bug fixes
* Better Error Handling
* Task Monitoring Tab for monitoring time intensive tasks (audio upload)
* New audio widget with better seeking features
